OOC: It's not just Airly.  I haven't seen anyone here yet who hasn't 
fudged names at least once, including myself.  I was just pointing 
out that it happens with much greater frequency here.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> OOC: you got to forgive Airly. Spanish is her first language, but I
> think she manages to do pretty nicely on this rpg. I could go on for
> hours on the subject, but I won't.
